title: Alok Sharma – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alok Sharma, the Conservative MP for Reading West, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I am backing Boris Johnson – he won a mandate from the electorate in 2019.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We need to get back to delivering on the Conservative manifesto we were elected on.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
